scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.start-all: concurrently --names "frontend,backend" "npm run start --prefix frontend" "npm run start --prefix backend"
scripts.start-all-dev: concurrently --names "frontend,backend,aws" "npm run start --prefix frontend" "npm run devStart --prefix backend" "npm run startAws --prefix backend"
